and the others walked leisurely further inside."},{"lineNumber":135232,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あ、ちょっと！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"H-hey, wait a nya..."},{"lineNumber":135238,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まさか招待客だったなんてにゃ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I never thought they were actually guests... nya.\""},{"lineNumber":135239,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、ええ、驚きよねー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yes, it’s surprising, isn’t it?\""},{"lineNumber":135240,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":135241,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":135242,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうした、シィル。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What's wrong, Sheila?"},{"lineNumber":135243,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さっきから暗い顔をしおって」","translatedEnglishLine":"You’ve had a gloomy look on your face since a while ago.\""},{"lineNumber":135244,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ、その……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no, it’s just...\""},{"lineNumber":135245,"originalJapaneseLine":"「緊張のせいでしょうか……","translatedEnglishLine":"I wonder if it’s because I’m nervous..."},{"lineNumber":135246,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さっきから少し体調が優れなくて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I haven’t been feeling very well since a little while ago...\""},{"lineNumber":135247,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ、乗り物酔いみたいな顔しおって。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What’s this, you have the face of someone with motion sickness."},{"lineNumber":135248,"originalJapaneseLine":"　吐くならエチケット袋にしろよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"If you’re going to vomit, use the etiquette bag.\""},{"lineNumber":135249,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう……そういう感じではなく……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh... it’s not really like that...\""},{"lineNumber":135250,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？　わけの分からんことを」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"? You’re saying something I don’t understand.\""},{"lineNumber":135251,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが次の扉を開いた瞬間、","translatedEnglishLine":"The moment Rance opened the next door,"},{"lineNumber":135252,"originalJapaneseLine":"一気に『それ』は溢れ出してきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"'That' suddenly began to overflow."},{"lineNumber":135253,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐわっ！？　なんだ！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gwah!? What is this!?\""},{"lineNumber":135254,"originalJapaneseLine":"　このモヤモヤは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"This haze!?\""},{"lineNumber":135255,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kuh...\""},{"lineNumber":135256,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケイブリスの体から放たれるオーラ、恐瘴気だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"The aura emanating from Kayblis’s body—it's dreadful miasma.\""},{"lineNumber":135257,"originalJapaneseLine":"「瘴気に当てられると","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you’re exposed to the miasma,"},{"lineNumber":135258,"originalJapaneseLine":"　弱い者から倒れていくぞ、","translatedEnglishLine":"the weak ones will be the first to fall,"},{"lineNumber":135259,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前ら、気をしっかりと保て！」","translatedEnglishLine":"you all, keep your composure!\""},{"lineNumber":135260,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はいっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yes...!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チビ相手にムキのなるのも恥ずかしいぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's embarrassing to get worked up over a kid."
"We definitely received an invitation for Kayblis,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お誘い合わせの上お越し下さいと
とても丁寧な招待状ももらったぞ」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's okay if we pass through, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とっとと通るにゃんー！　うわーん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We'll be going through quickly, nya! Waaah!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははははははははははははは！」
ランス達は悠々と奥へ向かっていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others walked leisurely further inside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦わなくてもいいんですか！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’re really going to let them through without fighting!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいつら行っちゃいましたよ！？」
招待状持ってると言ってたんだもん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they said they have an invitation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか招待客だったなんてにゃ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I never thought they were actually guests... nya."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっきから暗い顔をしおって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’ve had a gloomy look on your face since a while ago."
I wonder if it’s because I’m nervous...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっきから少し体調が優れなくて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I haven’t been feeling very well since a little while ago..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ、乗り物酔いみたいな顔しおって。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What’s this, you have the face of someone with motion sickness.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 吐くならエチケット袋にしろよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you’re going to vomit, use the etiquette bag."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うう……そういう感じではなく……」
「？　わけの分からんことを」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "? You’re saying something I don’t understand."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが次の扉を開いた瞬間、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The moment Rance opened the next door,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一気に『それ』は溢れ出してきた。
ケイブリスの体から放たれるオーラ、恐瘴気だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The aura emanating from Kayblis’s body—it's dreadful miasma."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 弱い者から倒れていくぞ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the weak ones will be the first to fall,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前ら、気をしっかりと保て！」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
